phrs.translation: 三叶木通, 八月炸, 三叶通木
毒鱼藤粉末, 毒鱼藤, 鱼藤, 三叶鱼藤
枸桔, 枳, 飞龙枳
八月札粉末, 八月札, 八月札提取物
三叶木通提取物, 白木通茎萃取物, 白木通提取物

sentences.sentence: The foliar surface structure of wild Akebia trifoliata(Thunb. ) Koidz. in Zhen'an Shaanxi have been observed by environmental scanning electron microscope.
sentences.translation: 利用环境扫描电镜，观察了野生三叶木通叶表面结构特征。

sentences.sentence: The chromosomes in root tip cells of Trifoliate orange(Poncirus trifoliata Raf. )and Ichang papeda(Citrus ichangensis Swingle)were observed by enzymic maceration technique.
sentences.translation: 用酶解法观察了枳和宜昌橙根尖细胞的染色体。

sentences.sentence: The soil physicochemical property of Akebia trifoliata habitats was studied by the related soil analysis method to provide reference for standardization cultivation of Akebia trifoliata in Guizhou.
sentences.translation: 为给贵州三叶木通的规范化种植提供一定参考，应用土壤农化分析的相关方法对其生境土壤理化特性进行了研究。
